name: ARM Outputs
description: This task reads the output values of an ARM deployment and sets them as VSTS variable
author: Kees Schollaart

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceNameARM
inputs.label: AzureRM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription.

inputs.name: resourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the resource group.

inputs.name: prefix
inputs.label: Prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a prefix for all VSTS variable to set (prefix is add to the key/name of the ARM output(s)

inputs.name: outputNames
inputs.label: Outputs to process
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a comma seperated list of ARM outputs (key/name) to process. If left empty, all outputs are processed

inputs.name: whenLastDeploymentIsFailed
inputs.label: When last deployment is failed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose the behaviour when the latest deployment is not succesful.
